api_key.description: The API key created by the API.

name.description: The name you will use to describe this API Key.

scopes.description: The individual permissions that you are giving to this API Key.

ips.description: The IP addresses that should be assigned to this subuser.

password.description: The password the subuser will use when logging into SendGrid.

generation.description: Defines the generation of the template, allowed values: legacy, dynamic (default).

name.description: The name of the template, max length: 100.

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last update of this template.

active.description: Set the version as the active version associated with the template. Only one version of a template can be active. The first version created for a template will automatically be set to Active. Allowed values: 0, 1.

editor.description: The editor used in the UI, allowed values: code (default), design.

generate_plain_content.description: If true (default), plain_content is always generated from html_content. If false, plain_content is not altered.

html_content.description: The HTML content of the version, maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed.

name.description: Name of the transactional template version, max length: 100.

plain_content.description: Text/plain content of the transactional template version, maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed.

subject.description: Subject of the new transactional template version, max length: 255.

test_data.description: For dynamic templates only, the mock json data that will be used for template preview and test sends.

thumbnail_url.description: A thumbnail preview of the template's html content.

updated_at.description: The date and time that this transactional template version was updated.
